title: JACQUARD KESA ROBE WITH BELT
desc: Long Kesa robe in silk-blend fabric with chiffon lining. This model features a decorative printed pattern against a striking tone-on-tone rose jacquard motif.• Kimono sleeves• Fastened with belt• Made in Italy• The model is 5' 9½" (177 cm) tall and wears a size S
